content: I've actually been carrying a harmonica around with me everywhere I go, and I've been practicing blowing and drawing notes during my daily commute. I'm still working on my tone and pitch control, but I think the harmonica could be a great addition to my music. I've also been thinking about starting a music group with some friends, and we're tossing around ideas for a name and a genre. We're all really into classic rock and blues, so we might go in that direction.
